p: E. platyloba species has geographical distribution in Alborz: Damavand, Ab Ali, West: Arak, Mahallat between Bagher Abad and Chehel Cheshmeh, Tangeh Badam, Bakhtaran, Fars: Servant, Kherameh, Deh Sheikh, East: Torbat-e Heydarieh, Robat Sefid and Neyshabur, Chaharmahal va Bakhtiari: Tange Sayad protected area, Ardal, Plain Dinarun, Shahr-e kord, Sureshjan, and from Harouni to Karsang.[ 15 19]
